alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 1:11AM CDT until April 20 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jewell County in north central Kansas... Southern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 111 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Guide Rock to near Mankato to near Jewell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Montrose around 120 AM CDT. Formoso, Randall, Webber and Lovewell State Park around 125 AM CDT. Bostwick around 130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Superior and Hardy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
